title: [Large-Scale] Virtual World-Based Medical Professional Training Program

context.additional_context: A simulation-based learning environment using virtual world platforms (e.g., Second Life), emphasizing real medical scenario replication and collaborative learning.

learning_goals: Enhancing diagnostic and treatment planning skills through a type 2 diabetes patient management simulation in a virtual environment

Learners can form a team of three peer learners on a virtual collaboration platform (e.g., Miro, Microsoft Teams), analyze two interdisciplinary medical scenarios (e.g., surgery, rehabilitation, patient education), and submit a consensus-based treatment plan with over 80% completeness via real-time chat/video conferencing.
Develop the capacity to critically evaluate the educational utility of virtual reality-based learning tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
